```py
> library(plyr)
> edges <- ldply(
+   c('Depends', 'Imports', 'Suggests'), function(depLevel) {
+     deps <- package.dependencies(pkgs, depLevel = depLevel)
+     ldply(names(deps), function(pkg)
+         if (!identical(deps[[pkg]], NA))
+             data.frame(
+                 src   = pkg,
+                 dep   = deps[[pkg]][, 1],
+                 label = depLevel,
+                 stringsAsFactors = FALSE))
+ })

```
